title: Highest available of the largest style one bedroom unit in the Peninsu
description: Highest available of the largest style one bedroom unit in the Peninsula! P904 receives incredible sunlight, as it has a Southern exposure. The unit showcases panoramic, unobstructed views of the Delaware River, Ben Franklin Bridge, and Center City Skyline through oversized floor-to-ceiling windows. Upon entering the unit, 13 x 13 inch Porcelain tiles run the periphery of the entryway into the kitchen, in a Marble-like mocha pattern and color, done in a 1/2 offset. 3 rows of clear/gold/mocha colored glass tiles act as a beautiful transition strip into the wide plank Tigerwood style floors that extend throughout the living room and hallway. Sound-proof padding has been installed under all the wide plank flooring. The floorplan is perfectly open, and one can admire the views as soon as they step into the unit, while cooking in the kitchen, or watching tv in the living room. The bathroom is over-sized, and features 12 inch Marble tiles throughout. There is a deep-soaking Kohler Jacuzzi tub, large vanity, and a conveniently located laundry room behind the closet doors, with additional shelving installed. The master bedroom has an incredibly large footprint, and can house a king size bed with side tables on each end, and even has ample room for a home office on top of that. The master bedroom also has both a walk-in closet, and a reach-in closet with additional added shelving for ample storage. There is an additional closet in both the entry-way, and hallway, bringing the total closet count in the unit to 5. P904 has a premium reserved parking spot (2-017) right outside the 2nd floor entry-way; this enables one to simply park and enter through the 2nd floor, and bypass the lobby if one desires. Waterfront Square Condominium & Spa is a premier gated community offering 24/7 guard and gate, as well as concierge, valet parking, pool and hot tub with river deck, fitness center, sauna and steam room, massage rooms and community rooms. There is a 3- level garage, with Philadelphia's largest green roof situated on top, inclusive of putting green! Waterfront Square resides on a 9.5-acre riverfront enclave, with lush manicured outdoor common parks and gardens right on the river's edge. Management is on site, and Waterfront boasts an advanced security system with closed-circuit television. For your convenience, Global Limousine runs on site from 6:45am to 7:11pm M-F, taking residents as far as 30th street and back home to their gated community. The river deck is oversized, encompassing a 25-meter heated lap pool (junior Olympic). EV stations are present for electric vehicles. Waterfront Square has an excellent location, due to it's proximity to area highways & airports (676,95, all bridges), yet is nestled away on the Delaware River - the best of both worlds! If its unparalleled luxury, showcasing the best views in Philadelphia, adorned with amenities, then it must be Waterfront Square Condominium & Spa!

title: And don’t forget the amazing amenities offered by this professionally
description:
Don’t miss out on this newly renovated, spacious, one-bedroom, one-bathroom residence at Garden Court Condominiums, an elegant, tree-lined, gated community in one of University City’s most coveted neighborhoods. Enter, and you will notice the beautifully restored hardwood floors and original crown moldings throughout. The folding, double French doors off the front hallway provide a dramatic entrance into a grand, luminous living room with three large windows and a spectacular 1920’s mantle. Across the hall, you will find an adorable, full bathroom (with an original stained glass window) and a graciously sized bedroom, also brimming with historical detail and ample natural light. Old world charm meets modern convenience with this condo’s easy, first floor access and state of the art, stylish upgrades. The fully remodeled kitchen has stunning granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, including a gas range, dishwasher, and stacked washer and dryer integrated seamlessly into the cabinetry. Off the kitchen, you will find a quaint and sun-filled dining area that can easily hold a mid-sized table set. If you’re worried about storage in a one-bedroom, worry no more, as this condo boasts a total of 8 closets throughout, yes 8! And don’t forget the amazing amenities offered by this professionally managed building, including an indoor, heated swimming pool, gym, library, billiards room, and gorgeously landscaped gardens with a koi pond. In terms of location, it doesn’t get any better than this, as Garden Court is within walking distance to Clark Park and its Farmers’ Market, ReAnimator Coffee, 48th Street Grille, Green Line Cafe, Local 44 and Bottle Shop, Don Barriga Mexican Grill, and Baltimore Avenue’s Restaurant Row. HUP, CHOP, UPenn, USciences, and Drexel are all also easily accessed, along with SEPTA’s bus, trolley, and subway routes. If you’re looking for easy living in a beautifully historic yet equally hip neighborhood, look no further.
If you are interested in learning more, please leave your phone number. I'll contact you very shortly. Thank you.

title: Offering studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments
description:
Offering studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center city philadelphia apartments near rittenhouse square be a part of history! Icon mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theã‚â national register of historic places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown philadelphia apartment nearã‚â rittenhouse square? You've found it! Icon is the most exciting rental property to ever grace rittenhouse square. A quintessential example of the art deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, icon's design is inspired by art deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, icon is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the great depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both cunard's white star line and the united states lines, and the esteemed pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th floor. Today, this history echoes throughout icon, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its art deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚â stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of philadelphia. Enhanced penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. title: optimally located just above the iconic philadelphia
description:
Introducing two six two four, a bespoke build tailored to the finest level of detail, optimally located just above the iconic philadelphia museum of art, in philadelphia's esteemed fairmount neighborhood. This sun-soaked and stately 4bd x 3.5ba 3200 sf corner residence is equipped with a stunningly modern gourmet kitchen featuring custom mid-continent cabinetry, caesarstone cloudburst concrete quartz counters and backsplash, deluxe lg appliances, picture windows and dedicated workstation. Two six two four also features a sunken living and dining lounge; multiple outdoor spaces; powder room with pocket door and graham & brown wallpaper; led vanity mirrors throughout; dedicated home office with southern-facing museum vistas through french doors; dedicated high-tech fitness studio with tonal smart home gym; full floor primary suite; wet bar with matching kitchen finishes; custom closets in every bedroom; wide plank oak hardwood flooring throughout; soaring ceiling heights of up to 11+ feet; a fully-finished lower level complete with a full bathroom and in-law suite + storage; custom wainscoting in each of the upper-floor bedrooms; dual-zone high powered hvac with nest thermostat; matte black and brushed gold plumbing fixtures; custom railings throughout; and all of the perks of contemporary new construction luxury living (built 2019, refurbished 2022). Each level of the house is spatially maximized to take advantage of the natural light emanating throughout the dramatic corner property with 3 exposures (south, north, east). A rear garden off of the kitchen with seasonal planters and turf provides a quaint green space retreat and is ideal for light gardening. The 2nd-storey sun terrace lends itself perfectly to year-round outdoor entertaining and decompression. Savor the philly skyline and museum vistas â€“ especially during sunrise and sunset hours, as the hilltop corner setting overlooks the fairmount neighborhood including fairmount park to the west. And the juliet balcony off the primary suite provides an inspirational perspective from high above the city. Professionally designed and managed landscaping features include custom planters and window boxes around the perimeter of the property which are automatically controlled by an irrigation system for maintenance-free greenery and beauty throughout all 4 pennsylvania seasons, complementing the lush natural surrounds of fairmount park. The handsomely striking white brick exterior is checkered with dozens of oversized pella casement energy efficient windows. The substantial curb appeal is immediately noticeable from the property's commanding corner presence at the intersection of brown and taney streets. title: Head downstairs to the lower level and you'll find a fantastic modern
description:
GORGEOUS Triplex in the Parkside neighborhood of Philadelphia! This tasteful conversion of this gorgeous building into a well planned out and incredibly well-designed multi-family is a one of a kind! From the outside you'll take in the beauty and charm of this 1915-built beauty. The masonry work is breathtaking! The large front porch, the columns, the brick-work, everything is precise and eye-popping! Walk in the common foyer entrance - you have options to go straight into unit 1, or up the steps to units 2&3. Into unit 1 we go - right into the family room. You'll notice the bright, cheerful, NEW updated and modern look immediately! Gorgeous bamboo floors, a neutral color palette, recessed lighting, and a beautiful glass balcony which looks down into the second lower level of this home. The owners wisely chose to open up the basement to allow natural light and a truly modern approach to this building! Completing this floor are a full bathroom, all tile with gorgeous and smartly-planned accents, and two huge bedrooms! At the back is an exit to the backyard. Head downstairs to the lower level and you'll find a fantastic modern kitchen with all the features you'll want - granite counters with room for seating, wood cabinets with lit glass-door accents, tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances, and a GIANT walk-in pantry! Head back toward the rear of the unit and you'll find a laundry room, powder room, office, and finally a HUGE third bedroom which can also double as a second family room, den, whatever you envision! Head up the stairs to Unit 2, a very similar look and feel with extremely bright and cheery natural light throughout, bamboo floors, an updated modern kitchen, complete with a full complement of appliances! Huge family room area two huge bedrooms and a beautifully designed bathroom! The middle bedroom also allows access to the fire escape. Up the stairs to Unit 3 - similar layout and finishes. Each unit includes on-demand gas-fired tankless hot water, a gas--fired furnace and central AC, and the quality fixtures and finishes you'd expect. Proof is in the figures - the pro-forma rent in our opinion is conservative, this is a great buy! Six years left on the tax abatement! This incredible find can be yours - act NOW.
If you are interested in learning more, please leave your phone number. I'll contact you very shortly. Thank you.

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available August 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA.
